content.text: 1 (4 ounce) bar German sweet chocolate, chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (4 ounce) bar German sweet chocolate, chopped" )

content.text: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed" )
( ing-5 "1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crust" )

content.text: 0) Microwave chocolate and 2 tablespoons of the milk in large microwave-safe bowl on high 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until chocolate is almost melted, stirring halfway through heating time.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Microwave"@3:12 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "chocolate"@13:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "2 tablespoons of the milk"@27:52 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "large microwave-safe bowl"@56:81 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "high"@85:89 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-0-0 "1 1/2 to 2 minutes"@90:108 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until chocolate is almost melted"@112:144 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:simultaneous ( ac-0-1 "stirring"@146:154 / AC )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Beat in cream cheese, sugar, and remaining milk with wire whisk until blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Beat in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "cream cheese"@11:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "sugar"@25:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "remaining milk"@36:50 / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-1-0 "wire whisk"@56:66 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until blended"@67:80 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Gently fold in 3 1/2 cups of the whipped topping until no streaks remain.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "fold in"@10:17 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "3 1/2 cups of the whipped topping"@18:51 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until no streaks remain"@52:75 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Before cutting pie, let stand at room temperature 15 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "stand"@27:32 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( cond-6-0 "Before cutting pie"@3:21 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:heat ( temp-6-0 "room temperature"@36:52 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "15 minutes"@53:63 / DUR )
	)
)
